#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

#define FOR(i,a,b)				for (int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define s(n)					scanf("%d",&n)
#define p(n)					printf("%d\n",n)
#define sd(n)					int n;scanf("%d",&n)

typedef long long ll;

int lastdigit(int n,int p)
{
	if (p==0) return 1;
	p=p%4;
	if (p==0) p+=4;
	int a=1;
	FOR(i,0,p) a*=n;
	return a%10;
}


int main()
{
	sd(t);
	char s[5000];
	ll a;
	bool hanged;
	int a2,a5,t2,t5,m;
	FOR(i,0,t)
	{
		scanf("%s",s);
		a=0;
		int len=strlen(s);
		hanged=false;
		a2=a5=0;m=1;
		int ci;
		for (int j=0;j<len&&(!hanged);j++)
		{
			ci=((int)s[j])-48;
			if (!(ci>9||ci<0)) a=(a*10)+ci;
			else
			{
				if (a==0) hanged=true;
				else
				{
					t2=0;t5=0;
					while (!(a%2)) {a=a>>1;t2++;}
					while (!(a%5)) {a/=5;t5++;}
					m*=(int)(a%10);
					m%=10;
					a2+=t2;a5+=t5;
					a=0;
				}
			}
		}
		if (!hanged)
		{
			if (a==0) hanged=true;
			else
			{
				t2=0;t5=0;
				while (!(a%2)) {a=a>>1;t2++;}
				while (!(a%5)) {a/=5;t5++;}
				m*=(int)(a%10);
				m%=10;
				a2+=t2;a5+=t5;
			}
		}
		//p(a2);p(a5);
		
		if (hanged) printf("Robot hanged.\n");
		else
		{
			if (a2>=a5)
			printf("%d\n",(m*lastdigit(2,a2-a5))%10);
			else printf("5\n");
		}
	}
		
	return 0;
}
